Alexander.IBA_description: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Americano.IBA_description: Mix the ingredients directly in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice-cubes, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.

Angel Face.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Aviation.IBA_description: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Bacardi.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Between the Sheets.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Casino.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist and a marachino cherry.
Casino.garnish: Lemon twist and a Marachino cherry

Clover Club.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well.

Daiquiri.IBA_description: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

Derby.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.

Dry Martini.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.

Gin Fizz.IBA_description: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler. Top with soda water. Garnish with lemon slice.

John Collins.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

Manhattan.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.Garnish with cocktail cherry.

Mary Pickford.IBA_description: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.

Monkey Gland.IBA_description: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Negroni.info: First mixed in Florence, 1919, at the request of Count Camillo Negroni
Negroni.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.Garnish with half orange slice.
Negroni.misc: Build directly in a rocks glass with ice
variants: Dutch Negroni: Substitute Genever for gin
Old Pal: Substitute dry vermouth and Canadian rye

Old Fashioned.IBA_description: Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water.

Paradise.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Planter's Punch.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, “on top”. Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.
Planter's Punch.garnish: Top with the bitters, a Maraschino cherry and pineapple

Porto Flip.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well.

Ramos Gin Fizz.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients (except soda) in a mixing glass, dry shake (no ice) for two minutes, add ice and hard shake for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice, top with soda.

Rusty Nail.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon twist.

Sazerac.IBA_description: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside.
variants: Rye became a common substitue for Cognac after the Civil War

Screwdriver.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice.

Sidecar.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

Stinger.IBA_description: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir.

Tuxedo.IBA_description: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail cherry and a lemon zest twist.
Tuxedo.garnish: Lemon twist and a Marachino cherry

Whiskey Sour.IBA_description: Dash egg white (Optional: if used shake little harder to foam up the egg white).

White Lady.IBA_description: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice.
